I've thought about writing a review for CS:Go many times, but I can't really describe what makes it so good, well enough to properly write about it.

It's the best game available right now, if you are into Shooter games.

Timing, reactions, planning, foresight, economy management, clutch kills, teamwork - but you can get rekt in .2 seconds of mucking about or distraction.

I rate it 9/10, would B Rush again.

The most fascinating part for me is the people, it doesn't matter what you really have planned - how the game plays out also depends on 9 other people and each of their moods.

I've been playing this for about 5 years, and between my 400~ other games, this is the one I keep coming back to.

Nothing beats the thrill of beating an insurmountable challenge, when you're down and you make a comeback.
